oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SWP5.1: Report of all three rounds of the Delphi Inquiry on the European Market for Organic Food
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Padel, Susanne
Seymour, Catherine
Foster, Carolyn
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Experts on organic food marketing and rural development from a variety of occupational backgrounds in 18 European countries were sent three subsequent questionnaires including feedback on the results of the previous round in this Delphi inquiry into the market for organic food and impact for rural development in Europe. The response to all three rounds has been good (response rate of 51% between the 1st and 3rd round). In broad terms the response of 129 experts to the third confirmed the tentative conclusions of the second round and provided some additional insights.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Padel, Susanne; Seymour, Catherine and Foster, Carolyn (2003) SWP5.1: Report of all three rounds of the Delphi Inquiry on the European Market for Organic Food. .
